verses.text: And it came to pass that the army of the king returned, having searched in vain for the people of the Lord.

And it came to pass that Gideon sent men into the wilderness secretly, to search for the king and those that were with him. And it came to pass that they met the people in the wilderness, all save the king and his priests.

verses.text: And now behold, the forces of the king were small, having been reduced, and there began to be a division among the remainder of the people.

verses.text: And now there was a man among them whose name was Gideon, and he being a strong man and an enemy to the king, therefore he drew his sword, and swore in his wrath that he would slay the king.
